trial_identification.studytitle: Pilot trial of the tolerability of hypertonic saline when delivered by a high-output nebuliser twice or four times daily to people with Cystic Fibrosis.
trial_identification.scientifictitle: Pilot trial of the tolerability of hypertonic saline when delivered by a high-output nebuliser twice or four times daily to people with Cystic Fibrosis.

interventions.interventions: 4mL of 6% saline delivered via an eFlow nebuliser four times daily for 2 weeks.
interventions.comparator: 4mL of 6% saline delivered via an eFlow nebuliser twice daily for 2 weeks

primaryOutcome.outcome: Tolerance of the prescribed regimen of inhalation
primaryOutcome.timepoint: Assessed at the end of the 2-week inhalation period

secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Measured at baseline and at the end of the 2-week inhalation period.
Measured at baseline and at the end of the 2-week inhalation period.

secondaryOutcome.outcome: Symptom severity on a visual analogue scale
secondaryOutcome.timepoint: Measured at baseline and at the end of the 2-week inhalation period.
Measured at baseline and at the end of the 2-week inhalation period.
Measured at baseline and at the end of the 2-week inhalation period.
Measured at baseline and at the end of the 2-week inhalation period.

eligibility.inclusivecriteria: Cystic fibrosis, member of RPA Hospital CF Clinic, stable clinical condition (no non-routine antibiotics in the previous 2 weeks), FEV1 >40% pred.
eligibility.exclusivecriteria: Unable/unwilling to provide informed consent, major haemoptysis in the previous year, pregnant or lactating, investigational drugs in the previous 30 days. There is no age limit.

trial_design.sequence: computer-generated random number list, with stratification for:(i) routine rhDNase use; Y/N(ii) FEV1 > 50% predicted on admission; Y/N(iii) routine HS use; Y/N(iv) presence of an epidemic P.aeruginosa pulsotype; Y/N(v) use of physiotherapy at least 5 / week; Y/N.

sponsorship.primarysponsorname: Sydney South West Area Health Service

ethicscommitee.ethicname: Sydney South West Area Health Service Ethics Review Committee
